gluttony.question: Did I give in to excessive eating, drinking, or other pleasures beyond what is reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: to overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I allow my attachment to bodily pleasures to cloud my judgment, leading me to overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over stable financial obligations and family needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked resources entrusted to me, prioritizing fleeting entertainment over stable financial obligations and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked resources entrusted to me, prioritizing wasteful indulgences over my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in my management of family resources
over their proper use for our needs
prodigality.question: Have I been excessively wasteful in my management of family resources, prioritizing unnecessary indulgences over their proper use for our needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in using my words to spread rumors or share private information about others
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in using my words to spread rumors or share private information about others, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it could have been avoided , thereby diminishing its sanctity
impiety.question: Did I engage in labor on a Sunday when it could have been avoided, thereby diminishing its sanctity?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: for rest , worship , and family time
impiety.question: Did you engage in work on a Sunday, even when it could have been avoided for rest, worship, and family time?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
